description: Alibaba’s Tongyi Lab researchers showed their new open source R1-Omni in two demonstrations  inferring the emotional state of a person in a video while also offering descriptions of their clothes and environment. The Chinese tech giant is looking to outpace OpenAI's latest model.
title: Alibaba Releases AI Model That Reads Emotions to Take On OpenAI

description: Apple is adding six games to its Apple Arcade game subscriptions service in April, including a new Katamari and Space Invaders titles. In addition to the two new mobile games, relaxing puzzle title puffies, management sim RollerCoaster Tycoon Classic+, board game The Game of Life 2+ and puzzle title Sesame Street Mecha Builders+ will join Apple Arcade next month.
title: Apple Arcade to Add New Katamari Damacy and Space Invader Games in April

description: Asus TUF Gaming F16 has been launched in India on Wednesday. The new gaming focused laptop is equipped with the Intel Core 5 210H processor alongside the Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050A GPU. The Asus TUF Gaming F16 features a 16-inch display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The Asus TUF Gaming F16 carries 16GB of onboard RAM and 512GB of storage. It boasts military-grade durability and houses a 56Wh battery.
title: Asus TUF Gaming F16 With Intel Core 5 210H Processor, 16-Inch Display Launched in India

description: Netflix’s Devil May Cry anime is set to premiere on April 3, delivering a faithful adaptation of Capcom’s franchise. The trailer showcases Dante’s iconic combat, a major role for White Rabbit, and the return of Vergil. Executive producer Adi Shankar confirms that the anime will draw from different Devil May Cry storylines, including characters from its manga. Johnny Yong Bosch voices Dante, while Kevin Conroy’s final role sees him as VP Baines. The show’s soundtrack teases early-2000s nostalgia, adding to the anticipation for this adaptation.
title: Devil May Cry OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Gladiator II, the highly anticipated sequel directed by Ridley Scott, is now available on Amazon Prime Video. Starring Paul Mescal as Lucius, the film follows his journey in the brutal gladiatorial arena. With a stellar cast, including Denzel Washington and Pedro Pascal, the movie has earned $500 million worldwide. Fans can now stream this historical epic with an active Prime Video subscription.
title: Gladiator II Now Available For Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: Global smartwatch shipments declined 7 percent year-on-year (YoY) in 2024, according to a new report by market research firm Counterpoint. Apple continued to hold the top position in worldwide smartwatch shipments, followed by Huawei and Samsung in second and third places, respectively. Xiaomi marked the fastest growth in 2024 and secured a spot among the top five for the first time.
title: Global Smartwatch Sales Decline for the First Time in 2024, Xiaomi Reports Strong Growth: Counterpoint

description: Google intends to acquire AdHawk Microsystems for $115 million (roughly Rs. 1003 crore), according to people with knowledge of the matter. That includes $15 million (roughly Rs. 130 crore) in future payments that will hinge on AdHawk reaching performance targets
title: Google Is Poised to Acquire Eye-Tracking Startup for Future Glasses

description: Google released the Gemma 3 family of artificial intelligence (AI) models on Wednesday. Successor to the Gemma 2 series, which was introduced in August 2024, these open-source models arrive with text and visual reasoning capabilities. The Mountain View-based tech giant said these models offer support for more than 35 languages and can be fine-tuned to offer additional support for 140 languages.
title: Google Releases Gemma 3 Family of Open-Source AI Models, Can Run on a Single GPU

description: Hubble’s latest image of the massive Sh2-284 nebula reveals young stars concealed within thick clouds of gas and dust. Using infrared imaging, astronomers have captured details previously obscured in optical wavelengths. The nebula’s low-metallicity composition provides a glimpse into the conditions of the early universe, shedding light on how stars formed in such environments. The study highlights how ionising radiation from nearby clusters shapes these intricate celestial structures, contributing to ongoing research in stellar evolution.
title: Hubble Captures Stunning Infrared Image of Sh2-284, a Massive Stellar Nursery

description: Hugging Face announced the expansion of its LeRobot platform on Wednesday with a large dataset aimed at automotive automation. The online artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) repository said that the dataset was created in collaboration with the AI startup Yaak. Dubbed Learning to Drive (L2D), the dataset was collected from a suite of sensors installed on 60 electric vehicles (EVs) over a period of three years.
title: Hugging Face Expands LeRobot Platform With Multimodal Dataset for AI-Powered Cars

description: Infinix Note 50X 5G is set to launch in India on March 27. The company previously teased the design of the rear camera module of the upcoming handset. Now, the brand has confirmed that the phone will run on XOS 15, based on Android 15, out-of-the-box. Infinix has unveiled some of the key features of the XOS 15 user interface.
title: Infinix Note 50X 5G Confirmed to Launch in India With Android 15-Based XOS 15

description: Meta has reportedly begun testing its first in-house chipsets that will be used to train artificial intelligence (AI) models. As per the report, the company has deployed a limited number of processors to test the performance and sustainability of the custom chipsets, and based on how well the tests go, it will begin large-scale production of the said hardware.
title: Meta Reportedly Testing First In-House Chipsets Designed for AI Training

description: Motorola Edge 60 series is expected to succeed the Edge 50 lineup. It appears that the upcoming Edge 60 lineup could get a new variant with an inbuilt stylus. Leaked renders said to be of the Edge 60 Stylus have surfaced online. Pricing detail of the rumoured handset has been leaked as well. The Edge 60 Stylus could have a dedicated storage slot for the stylus at the bottom edge.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Could Be in Development; Design Render Leaked Online

description: Mufasa: The Lion King is set to premiere on JioHotstar on March 26, 2025. Directed by Barry Jenkins, the prequel explores Mufasa’s journey from an orphaned cub to the king of the Pride Lands. The Hindi voice cast includes Shah Rukh Khan, Aryan Khan and AbRam Khan, adding to the film’s appeal. With breathtaking visuals and a compelling narrative, the film will be available in English, Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu, allowing fans to experience the story in multiple languages.
title: Mufasa: The Lion King OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Recent research challenges traditional views on planetary-mass objects, suggesting they may form through violent interactions between young star systems rather than standard planetary or stellar processes. Simulations indicate these clashes create dense gas filaments that evolve into free-floating objects, often in binary pairs. This discovery explains the abundance of such objects in star clusters like Orion and raises the possibility of a third cosmic classification beyond planets and stars.
title: Mysterious Planetary-Mass Objects May Form in Young Star System Clashes

description: Researchers propose that an overlooked dark matter candidate may explain unusual ionisation levels in the Milky Way’s Central Molecular Zone (CMZ). This theory suggests that lightweight, self-annihilating dark matter particles could be producing electrons and positrons, influencing cosmic chemistry. The findings challenge conventional views, offering a new way to detect dark matter beyond its gravitational effects. Upcoming space missions, like NASA’s COSI telescope, may provide evidence to support this groundbreaking hypothesis.
title: New Dark Matter Hypothesis Suggests Ionisation Clue in Milky Way’s Core

description: Realme P3 Ultra 5G is all set to go official on March 19 in India. As we wait for the formal reveal, Realme has announced new details about the upcoming P series smartphone. The Realme P3 Ultra 5G is teased to come in a lunar dark design. It will be available in two colour options in the country with a lightweight build and quad-curved display.
title: Realme P3 Ultra 5G Teased to Get Glow-in-the-Dark Lunar Design, Two Colour Options

description: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon, a direct-to-video film from 2002, will be streaming on Lionsgate Play. The movie follows lifeguard Ben Carpenter and marine biologist Cataline Stone as they face off against a prehistoric Megalodon threatening a coastal town. Starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane, the film is known for its low-budget effects and internet meme status. Despite poor reviews, it has gained a cult following over time. Read on for details on its plot, cast, and reception.
title: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon OTT Release: Where to Watch, Plot, Cast, and More

description: The guidelines for corporate firms’ participation in crypto will be finalised by April, South Korea’s FSC said Wednesday. Kim So-young, the Vice Chairperson of the FSC, chaired the meeting. He said that US President Donald Trump’s pro-crypto actions had sharpened dialogue on the institutionalisation of VDAs.
title: South Korea to Finalise Crypto-Focussed ‘Corporate Market Participation' Guidelines by April

description: Under the proposal, TSMC would run the operations of Intel's foundry division, which makes chips adapted for the needs of customers, but it would not own more than 50 percent, the sources said. Qualcomm has also been pitched by TSMC, according to one of the sources and a separate source.
title: TSMC Said to Have Pitched Intel Foundry JV to Nvidia, AMD and Broadcom

description: Vivo V50 Lite 4G had recently appeared on the Google Play Console showcasing its design and features. Now, a new report has surfaced that suggests the expected price of the phone's global variant. The report also includes design renders that appear to be similar to that seen on the Play Console. Certain features of the purported handset have also been suggested in the report.
title: Vivo V50 Lite 4G Global Variant Price, Design, Key features Leaked

description: On Wednesday, March 12, WazirX announced BitGo as its official asset custodian. Through this partnership, WazirX will leverage BitGo’s institutional-grade infrastructure, multi-signature wallets, and insurance coverage of up to $250 million (approximately Rs. 2,180 crore) to restore community trust.
title: WazirX Partners With BitGo for Asset Custody Services Amid Ongoing Financial Restructuring

description: A room-temperature quantum computer has been developed by Xanadu, addressing scalability and error correction challenges in the field. Named Aurora, the system uses photonic qubits and connects multiple modules via fibre optics, removing the need for extreme cooling. Published in Nature, the study highlights its potential for large-scale quantum data centres, cryptography, and drug discovery simulations. Experts note the modular approach may improve error correction, but its full impact remains to be seen. Future research aims to reduce optical signal loss for better performance.
title: World’s First Modular Quantum Computer Operates at Room Temperature

description: Oppo F29 5G series will be introduced in India soon. The lineup will include the standard Oppo F29 5G and the Oppo F29 Pro 5G. Several leaked specifications about the Oppo F29 handsets had recently surfaced online. However, the company has now announced the launch date of the phones and confirmed their key features, colour options and availability details.
title: Oppo F29 5G, F29 Pro 5G India Launch Date Set for March 20; Design, Specifications and Colours Confirmed

description: Google updated the Pixel Studio app as a part of its March Pixel Drop for compatible Pixel devices. With the update, the artificial intelligence (AI) app is finally getting the ability to generate images of people. The app was first introduced in August 2024 alongside the Pixel 9 series, and is currently exclusive to the series.
title: Google Updates AI-Powered Pixel Studio App to Let Users Generate Images of People

description: Apple has rolled out iOS 18.3.2, iPadOS 18.3.2, and macOS Sequoia 15.3.2, addressing a vulnerability exploited by hackers to target individuals. This marks the third major security flaw patched by Apple this year. Eligible iPhone, iPad, and Mac users are urged to update to the latest versions, which include fixes for the browser engine, enhancing overall security and safeguarding against potential threats.
title: Apple Releases iOS 18.3.2, macOS 15.3.2 Updates to Fix Security Flaw That Enabled 'Extremely Sophisticated Attack'

description: The Zenbook A14 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 14-inch Full HD+ OLED display that offers decent colours. It also features a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite processor that delivers decent performance and long-lasting battery life. The device also features an ErgoSense keyboard with decent key travel and a large touchpad for a smooth typing and scrolling experience.
title: Asus Zenbook A14 Review: A Sleek and Lightweight Everyday Machine

description: iPad Air (2025) and 11th Generation iPad (2025) sale in India commenced today (March 12). Apple refreshed its iPad lineup earlier this month, equipping the iPad Air and the base iPad model with new SoCs. Available in 11-inch and 13-inch sizes, the iPad Air (2025) is powered by Apple’s M3 chipset which brings support for Apple Intelligence — the company’s artificial intelligence (AI) suite. Meanwhile, the 11th generation iPad (2025) gets the A16 chip and a storage upgrade.
title: iPad Air (2025) and 11th Generation iPad (2025) Sale Begins in India: Price, Offers

description: Vivo launched the X200 Pro and X200 in India at the end of last year with MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipsets. Now the Chinese smartphone is said to bring the Vivo X200 Ultra and X200 Mini models to Indian shores. The Vivo X200 Ultra is expected to go official in China soon, whereas the Vivo X200 Pro mini has been available in China since October last year. Vivo is likely to launch the Vivo X200 Ultra in April. The Vivo X200 Ultra will succeed last year's X100 Ultra.
title: Vivo X200 Ultra and X200 Pro Mini to Reportedly Launch in the Indian Market

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 2.09 percent over the last day. On Wednesday, March 12, Bitcoin and Ether reflected notable losses on national and international price charts. Altcoins like Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and Chainlink saw minor gains as markets remain volatile. Analysts have strongly advised investors to be cautious with investments.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Hovers Near $80,000 as Market Volatility Continues, Altcoins Show Minor Gains

description: OpenAI made several developer-focused announcements in a live stream on Tuesday. The San Francisco-based AI giant is introducing a new application programming interface (API) and an open-source software development kit (SDK) that will allow developers to build artificial intelligence (AI) agents and manage multi-agent workflows. Alongside, the company also previewed three tools that will be part of the new Responses API.
title: OpenAI Unveils Responses API, Agents SDK to Help Developers Build AI Agents

description: Lenovo has unveiled the Tab K9 and Tab One, which have similar designs and features. However, the company has not yet confirmed their price and availability details. Since they are almost identical, the brand will likely launch both models in different markets. Both models come with a MediaTek Helio G85 chipset and a 5,100mAh battery with support for 20W wired charging.
title: Lenovo Tab K9 With MediaTek Helio G85 SoC, 5,100mAh Battery Unveiled; Tab One With Similar Features Teased

description: Pixel 9a is expected to launch soon, and we have already seen leaks about the specification, pricing and pre-order dates of Google's next mid-range phone. Now, a new hands-on video has emerged online, giving us a look at the device's design. The footage reveals the phone in a black shade with a slightly-flushed camera island at the rear. The new video doesn't provide any new details about the Pixel 9a, but it shows the phone’s camera interface and zoom capabilities.
title: Pixel 9a Alleged Hands-on Video Suggests New Camera Interface and Zoom Options

description: Moon Studios says it has acquired the publishing rights to its top-down action-RPG No Rest for the Wicked and is now “fully independent”. The developer bought back the rights from Take-Two Interactive following prolonged negotiations and will publish the game independently when it launches.
title: Moon Studios Says It's 'Fully Independent', Buys No Rest for the Wicked Publishing Rights From Take-Two

description: MSI RTX 50 series laptops were launched in India on Wednesday. Aimed at enhancing artificial intelligence (AI)-driven computing, they come equipped with the latest processors from AMD and Intel. They also get Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series laptop GPU with DLSS 4 frame-generation technology. All models feature 4K Mini LED screens, up to 96GB of DDR5 memory, and PCIe Gen 5 and Gen 4 SSDs. The lineup features offerings from MSI’s Titan, Raider, Stealth and Vector series, enabling users to choose between different options depending on their use case.
title: MSI RTX 50 Series Laptops With Mini LED Screens, AMD and Intel SoCs Launched in India

description: Samsung is reportedly developing motion controllers for Project Moohan, its first Android XR headset. The prototype supports hand-based gestures, similar to the Apple Vision Pro. However, Samsung is also said to be developing optional controllers for improved accuracy, catering to gaming and specific app requirements. These first-party controllers are expected to be sold separately, providing users with additional functionality while enhancing the overall experience of the headset.
title: Samsung Reportedly Developing First-Party Controllers for Project Moohan Android XR Headset

description: OnePlus seems to be preparing to launch new phones in the Ace 5 series. The lineup is likely to include a OnePlus Ace 5V model and a OnePlus Ace 5s model. The former is expected to arrive with the Snapdragon 8s Elite chip, whereas the latter could run on the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC. Most recently, a Chinese tipster has suggested details about the OnePlus Ace 5s.
title: Alleged OnePlus Ace 5s Key Specifications Leaked; Said to Get MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC, 6.83-Inch Display

description: Samsung Galaxy F16 5G has been launched in India as the successor to the Galaxy F15 5G, which was unveiled in the country in March 2024. The latest Galaxy F16 5G is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and it is backed by a 5,000mAh battery with 25W wired fast charging support. For optics, it carries a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and a 13-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Samsung Galaxy F16 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 50-Megapixel Camera Launched in India

description: Google Pixel 10 series is rumoured to be in development and expected to launch some time later this year. Ahead of their anticipated debut, CAD renders of the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL have been leaked. As per the leaked renders, the phones could retain similar design elements and form factor as the Pixel 9 series.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series CAD Renders Leaked; Suggest Triple Cameras on the Base Pixel

description: Jio Platforms Limited announced a strategic partnership with SpaceX on Wednesday, a move which will introduce Starlink broadband services in India. The Reliance Industry subsidiary says it will leverage the Elon Musk-owned company’s constellation of low-Earth orbit satellites to provide its customers with high-speed broadband services even in the country’s most remote and rural areas.
title: Jio Partners With SpaceX to Offer Starlink Broadband Internet Services in India

description: In the shadow of its predecessor, the iQOO Neo 9 Pro, the new iQOO Neo 10R comes with a new branding and some big shoes to fill. Like its predecessor, it too, is expected to be a true "flagship killer," aiming to offer incredible value at a more digestible mid-range price tag. Despite receiving a different cosmetic treatment and design, upgrades appear to be a bit limited. We take a closer look at what’s new.
title: iQOO Neo 10R First Impressions
